name: Hell's portals
description:
A "good" God is stealing fame from you, Chaos. Bring to the world your might and regain your fame.

Destroy the world with your portals, each has its own power !

Made in one week during "Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2".

_____________

Commands :

Move the camera using directionnal keys, the rest is point and click.

_____________

Credits :
